title: 54 days of deals: Saudi Arabia launches massive nationwide Ramadan Sales Season
summary_full: Get ready for early Ramadan shopping. The Ministry of Commerce is launching a 54-day sales season starting February 1, 2026. This initiative aims to help shoppers buy festive goods before the rush. Businesses can easily apply for discount permits online. Consumers can verify offers by scanning barcodes. Inspection teams will ensure all promotions are legitimate.
